title: Loops (for / while)
concept: This level focuses on using loop constructs in C such as for and while. You will practice repeating computations, generating sequences, and using counters. Be careful with off-by-one errors and whitespace formatting in output. No extra messages should be printed.

challenges.title: Print 1 to N
challenges.description: Read an integer N and print numbers from 1 to N separated by spaces.

challenges.title: Sum of 1 to N
challenges.description: Calculate the sum of numbers from 1 to N.

challenges.title: Factorial
Count Digits
challenges.description: Read an integer and print how many digits it has.

challenges.title: Reverse a Number
challenges.description: Reverse the digits of the given integer and print the reversed number.

challenges.title: Sum of Digits
challenges.description: Print the sum of digits of the given number.

challenges.title: Power Using Loop
challenges.description: Read a and b and compute a^b using loop.

challenges.title: Fibonacci N Terms
challenges.description: Print first N Fibonacci numbers separated by spaces.

challenges.title: Prime or Not
challenges.description: Print Yes if the number is prime else print No.

challenges.title: Sum of First N Even Numbers
challenges.description:
Print the sum of the first N even natural numbers.
Example: N = 4 → 2 + 4 + 6 + 8 = 20
